title: Ad unit display
custom_expected:
THEN the following ad units are displayed based on viewport size:
Desktop (769+):
Header - 970x90 or 728x90
Skins - (required AdOps targeting)
Rail - 300x250 after first item; after every three subsequent items

Tablet/Mobile (768 and lower):
Header - 320x50
Inline: 300x250 after first item; after every three subsequent items

title: Browser title updates with initial article title on load
custom_expected:
THEN it will display the title of the first article displayed
AND the URL pattern will update with the article slug

title: Browser title updates with article displayed in index
custom_expected:
THEN the browser title will update with the article title displayed
AND the URL pattern will update with the article slug

title: Video autoplays upon initial load when articles set to autoplay (true)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MLB News Page
custom_steps: When a news article is set to autoplay (true)
custom_expected: Then video autoplays upon initial load

title: Search News cell displayed at 996px+
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
https://www.milb.com/milb/news
AND viewport of 996px+
custom_expected:
THEN a search cell displays in the upper right of the page
AND it displays the text "Search News" to the left of the cell and a magnifying glass to the right of the cell

title: Filter Search by Month/Year displayed at 996px+
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
https://www.milb.com/milb/news
AND viewport of 996px+
custom_expected:
THEN the words "Filter Search By:" are displayed in the upper right with a "GO" button
AND a "Month" dropdown is displayed with the twelves months of the year
AND a "Year" dropdown is displayed with the years 2017 through 2005 descending

title: Search icon displayed at 995px and below
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
https://www.milb.com/milb/news
AND viewport of 995px or less
custom_expected:
THEN a magnifying glass is displayed in the upper right
AND clicking the magnifying glass expands the search cell
AND clicking the "X" or clicking the magnifying glass a second time dismisses the search cell

title: Back to MiLB.com Home
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "<< Back to MiLB.com Home" link
custom_expected:
THEN the MiLB homepage is displayed
http://www.milb.com/ (redirects to http://www.milb.com/index.jsp)

title: Back to League Home
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "<< Back to Appalachian League Home" link
custom_expected:
THEN the Appalachian League homepage is displayed
http://www.appyleague.com/ (redirects to http://www.milb.com/index.jsp?sid=l120)

title: Back to Team Home
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "<< Back to www.swbrailriders.com Home" link
custom_expected:
THEN the Railriders homepage is displayed
http://www.swbrailriders.com redirects to (http://www.milb.com/index.jsp?sid=t531)

title: Right rail displayed at 1081px+
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
https://www.milb.com/milb/news
AND viewport is 1081px+
custom_expected: THEN the right-rail index/ads are displayed

title: Confirm MiLB topic list populates
custom_expected:
THEN articles will be displayed
AND page topic is "Now Reading: Top Headlines"
AND the topic id is 185364810

title: Confirm league topic list populates
custom_expected:
THEN articles will be displayed
AND page topic is "Now Reading: Appalachian League News"
AND the topic id is 209979214

title: Confirm team topic list populates
custom_expected:
THEN articles will be displayed
AND page topic is "Scranton/WB RailRiders News"
AND the topic id is 196097304

title: View More / View Less functionality
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "View More" at the end of an article
custom_expected:
THEN the article content is expanded to reveal additional detail
AND clicking "View Less" collapses the article

title: Gameday box score functionality
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing the article
AND clicking "Gameday box score"
custom_expected:
THEN Gameday launches to display the game data
https://www.milb.com/gameday/ports-vs-giants/2017/06/26/497234#game_state=final,game_tab=,game=497234

title: Game recap functionality
custom_expected:
THEN display:
-"RECAP" in white font color in red box
-Winning team displayed first in red font color
-Losing team displayed second in default font color

title: Line score functionality
custom_expected:
THEN the linescore module is displayed under the byline
AND clicking a team name loads the team page in the same window
AND clicking a player name loads the player card in the same window
AND clicking the Box Score button under the table loads the MiLB.com box score page
AND clicking the Plays button under the table loads the MiLB.com plays page

title: Byline suppressed when data not available
custom_expected: THEN the byline is not displayed

title: Press release functionality
custom_expected:
THEN press releases are included
https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms-milb-app-content-qa/id/v1/185364810/details/web-v1.json

MiLB - No Featured Video with Thumbnail
MiLB - No Featured Image, No Featured Video & No Thumbnail

Team - No Featured Video with Thumbnail

League - No Featured Image With Thumbnail
League - No Featured Video with Thumbnail
League - No Featured Image, No Featured Video & No Thumbnail
Featured Players display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
1 Player - https://www.milb.com/milb/news/prospect-qa-optimistic-milwaukee-brewers-outfielder-brett-phillips-adjusts-approach/c-216189992/t-185364810
2 Players - https://www.milb.com/milb/news/new-york-yankees-prospect-gleyber-torres-doubles-twice-in-spring-training-game/c-217052776/t-185364810
3 Players - https://www.milb.com/milb/news/houston-astros-francis-martes-minnesota-twins-nick-gordon-among-top-prospects-cut-from-major-league-camp-in-spring-training/c-219858380/t-185364810
4 Players - https://www.milb.com/milb/news/minnesota-twins-mike-quade-ok-after-car-accident/c-217218160/t-185364810
5 Players - https://www.milb.com/milb/news/moncada-torres-head-down-to-minors/c-220287898/t-185364810
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the featured player section
custom_expected:
THEN up to four players are displayed by default
AND clicking "Show More" or "Show Less" will display/hide any additional players

title: Featured Player without headshot displays silhouette
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Featured Player who does not have a headshot (Ty Hensley)
custom_expected: THEN a silhouette is displayed

title: Confirm Outbrain suggested articles are displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to:
https://www.milb.com/milb/news
AND Outbrain is enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing an article
AND clicking "View More" expands the article
custom_expected:
THEN two columns (Sponsored Content, We Recommend) are displayed
AND articles are displayed under each column
AND "Recommended by Outbrain" is displayed in the lower right

title: Facebook share
custom_expected:
THEN a share sheet appears with:
-featured image
-title
-blurb
AND
share links back to article

title: Twitter share
custom_expected:
THEN a share sheet appears with:
-title
-short link
-@milb mention
AND
share links back to article

title: Google+ Share
custom_expected:
THEN a share sheet appears with:
-featured image
-title
-blurb
AND
share links back to article

title: Email share
custom_expected:
THEN a new email appears with:
-subject (article title)
-title
-article URL
AND
url links back to article

title: Print
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the article is displayed in a format devoid of headers/footers/ads, etc... displaying only title, blurb, article

title: Photo Primary
custom_expected: THEN images should display full width at all viewports (please include a 16x9 and a non-16x9)

title: Twitter
custom_expected:
THEN twitter embed should be centered on all viewports
AND clickthrough to native tweet

title: YouTube
custom_expected:
THEN YouTube video should display full-width inline on all viewports
AND playback successfully

title: MiLB.com Video Embed
custom_expected:
THEN MiLB.com video should display full-width inline on all viewports
AND successfully play back

title: HTML Include
custom_expected:
THEN images, links should display; maintain across all devices

Ex: ques_include (right side, displays "Watch games live on MiLB.TV, Download the MiLB apps, Get tickets, Visit the MiLB shop")
https://www.milb.com/milb/news/bryan-reynolds-collects-four-hits-for-san-jose-giants/c-238984616/t-185364810

title: Link
custom_expected: THEN link tokens should resolve correctly based on access using a desktop or mobile device

title: Player
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate player page will open based on access using a desktop or mobile device

title: Confirm search filter functionality
custom_steps:
WHEN filtering by:
Month = April
Year = 2016
AND clicking "GO" button
custom_expected: THEN articles from April 2016 are displayed

title: Confirm search by keyword
custom_expected:
THEN the search title displays "News Search: hotdog"
AND articles with the keyword "hotdog" are displayed

title: Confirm search by keyword (no results)
custom_expected:
THEN the search title displays "News Search: fiddlestick"
AND "Sorry, there are no results that match your search" is displayed

title: Confirm article displayed in index returns with search
custom_steps: WHEN searching for an article displayed in the index (ex: by keyword)
custom_expected: THEN the article is returned in the search results
